Description: Fragmentary handle of Attic black-glazed pottery cup or skyphos; wholly glazed.
Curator's comments: Object owned and held by Akademisches Kunstmuseum. This record is included in the British Museum database as part of the Museum’s Naukratis Project, a research collaboration that aims to virtually re-unite finds from the ancient port city of Naukratis, now distributed over 80 museums worldwide.
Piekarski gives comparisons to early cups and stemlesses: Sparkes, Agora XII nos. 403 - 405 pl. 19; nos. 449 and 454 pl. 21; fig. 5.
Bibliographic references: Piekarski 2001 / Die Keramik aus Naukratis im Akademischen Kunstmuseum Bonn (p.45 no. D1 pl. 18.1)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.1613)
